Trade/Device Name(s): Genesis Health Technologies Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Genesis Health Technologies Blood Glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Genesis Health Technologies Blood Glucose Monitoring System model TD-4123 for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger, palm, forearm, and upper arm as an aid to monitoring diabetes control at home; not for diagnosis or neonatal use; for single-user only
